summary:
Disneyland, located in Anaheim, California, was the first theme park created by the Walt Disney Company. Walt Disney wanted to build a place where fans could visit and be entertained. He chose a larger site near Anaheim after realizing his original idea was too small. The park opened in 1955 and has since become a world-famous destination.

Designed by a talented team, Disneyland has expanded with new areas like New Orleans Square and Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It's one of the most popular theme parks globally, attracting millions of visitors each year and creating many jobs in the process.
title: Disneyland
